about_the_game:
A cartoon inspired puzzle platformer that takes you on a journey through giant stacks of old TVs. Navigate six unique cartoon episodes, solve puzzles, save the creatures and shut down the Broadcast that is twisting your fellow island dwellers.

On your journey you will acquire a wide variety of items. Your arsenal is filled with everyday items that are much more than meets the eye. Take the unassuming hairdryer for example. It is used to repel incoming projectiles, provide a form of propulsion and obviously as a way to dry things. Figure out the unique uses of each item and make your way through the episode and to the top of the stack.

- Vibrant cartoon style
- Wide variety of items to solve puzzles with
- Cute and weird creatures to rescue (mostly weird ones)
